metadata.name: Is this role being posted for the immigration team?

title: Healthcare Operations Manager
content:
Our Opportunity:  
Chewy’s mission is to be the most trusted and convenient destination for pet parents and partners everywhere. We view pets (and pet parents) as family and are obsessed with meeting their needs and exceeding customer expectations through every interaction. Within Chewy, the Chewy Health team is focused on advancing how veterinarians and pet parents care for pets and are on a multi-year journey to enhance the experience of working with veterinarians to keep pets happy and healthy.  
As part of this mission, the Chewy Health team is hiring a Manager, Healthcare Operations to help us build a suite of services for customers to manage every step of their pet parent journey and veterinarian care for their pet. This position is a unique opportunity to work with one of the most dynamic and innovative teams at Chewy.  
 What you’ll do  
As a Manager, Healthcare Operations, you will serve as a leader of veterinary team members, embodying the Chewy culture to work collaboratively with your peers and deliver the pet parent WOW experience.  
The Manager, Healthcare Operations responsibilities include: 

Oversee operational performance, scheduling, reviewing SOPs and metrics to guide and advance your team.  
Serve as a people leader, mentoring team members with their career development, including conducting reviews, feedback and supporting training. 


Engage with stakeholders to uphold Customer-First practices and deliver consistent “WOW” experiences. 
Implement operational strategies as determined by the management team.  
Consistently monitor and evaluate operational effectiveness in addition to employee engagement and satisfaction; communicate and relay feedback to management as appropriate. 
Guide the team in following Standard Operating Procedures (SOPs).   


Communicate clearly and respectfully with stakeholders and team members.  
Aid others on the team in their use of job-specific technology and software  

 
What you’ll need  

3+ years of experience as a people leader 
Experience in veterinary clinics required  
Experience mentoring, training and leading others  
Experience managing budgets, P&L, and operations required 
Strong ability to connect with stakeholders and demonstrate empathy and compassion  
Ability to manage conflict resolution  
Excellent verbal / written communication, observational, and analytical skills 
Ability to work in a fast-paced environment 

 
 
Chewy is committed to equal opportunity. We value and embrace diversity and inclusion of all Team Members.
If you have a disability under the Americans with Disabilities Act or similar law, or you require a religious accommodation, and you wish to discuss potential accommodations related to applying for employment at our company, please contact HR@Chewy.com.
To access Chewy’s Privacy Policy, which contains information regarding information collected from job applicants and how we use it, please click here: Chewy Privacy Policy.
 Chewy is committed to equal opportunity. We value and embrace diversity and inclusion of all Team Members. If you have a disability under the Americans with Disabilities Act or similar law, and you need an accommodation during the application process or to perform these job requirements, or if you need a religious accommodation, please contact CAAR@chewy.com.
 
If you have a question regarding your application, please contact HR@chewy.com.
 
To access Chewy's Customer Privacy Policy, please click here. To access Chewy's California CPRA Job Applicant Privacy Policy, please click here.

questions.label: How did you hear about Chewy?
Have you been employed by Chewy in the past?
What is your expected compensation range for this position?
What is your highest level of education obtained?
Are you legally authorized to work in the United States without employer support or sponsorship?
Will you require sponsorship to work in the United States at any time in the future?
Are you willing to submit to a post-offer, pre-employment background check and drug test?

SMS Consent: By providing my telephone number on this employment application form, I consent to receive automated text messages and pre-recorded voice messages from Chewy at that telephone number regarding any matter related to my job application to Chewy. Chewy will not use this telephone number for marketing or advertising solicitation purposes. Message and data rates may apply. You may opt out of these messages at any time by replying 'STOP' to any text messages you receive.
